channel.title: Project Poseidon 317 - Summon-Pkz Base
channel.description:
[u][size=5][b]Poseidon Tidal Wave[/b][/size][/u]
I'm going to make a new 317 project in a few months, possibly a year, so I'll just talk to you about it. This will feature anything there can in a private server, and it'll be bigger than Full Metalst-Scape. It's going to be called Poseidon Tidal Wave. Here's a pic of the client background so far:
[i]Background[/i] [IMG]http://img383.imageshack.us/img383/8629/backgroundsd6.png[/img]
[i]Titlebox[/i] [IMG]http://img383.imageshack.us/img383/7107/titleboxlt5.png[/img]
[i]Background With the Titlebox[/i] [IMG]http://img383.imageshack.us/img383/2154/clientbackgroundzx6.jpg[/img]
[i]Sephiroth Chatback0![/i]
[IMG]http://img228.imageshack.us/img228/2535/chatback0oc1.jpg[/img]
[u][b]Source In-Game Pictures[/b][/u]
[i]Hans will ask the player if he/she likes the server. They'd select 'Yes' or 'No'. The 'Yes' option isn't working at the moment.[/i] [IMG]http://img236.imageshack.us/img236/3771/hansserverprogressxg4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img228.imageshack.us/img228/2571/npcdialoguepj6.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img132.imageshack.us/img132/3131/npcdialoguepartiiwm9.jpg[/img]
[i]The Lumbridge Guide will welcome the player to the official server and source.[/i] [img]http://img81.imageshack.us/img81/7782/npcdialoguetutorialyi6.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img222.imageshack.us/img222/5962/serverprogressviiivm7.jpg[/img]
[i]The home area. Changes may apply, because I'm making the new home Tutorial island, then the player would teleport to Lumbridge at the end of the Tutorial like RuneScape![/i] [IMG]http://img236.imageshack.us/img236/9751/serverprogresspartiirz6.jpg[/img]
[i]Mod and Admin crowns work on MoparScape 3.2 and Silab Client, of course. The client will have different, and better, crowns.[/i] [IMG]http://img236.imageshack.us/img236/7379/serverprogresspartiiiko4.jpg[/img]
[i]Doors actually open in the server and source![/i] [IMG]http://img132.imageshack.us/img132/8462/serverprogresspartivva1.jpg[/img]
[i]Reserved for the Cook's Assistant quest, later on in development. Rather get the easy stuff going first.[/i] [IMG]http://img132.imageshack.us/img132/6961/serverprogresspartvfq3.jpg[/img]
[i]Explosive new Vengeance text![/i] [IMG]http://img132.imageshack.us/img132/853/serverprogresspartvief0.jpg[/img]
[i]Same old shops :(.[/i] [IMG]http://img118.imageshack.us/img118/1456/serverprogresspartviihm5.jpg[/img]
More pictures coming soon when progress is finished. I have been working on just NPC dialogue for today.
[u]Work In Progress[/u]:
Green - Completed Blue - Almost Completed/Not Sure Red - Not completed
[u][b]Skills[/b][/u] Fletching Herbolore Prayer Magic Ranged HitPoints Agility *Smithing Mining *Fishing
[u][b]PVP/Economy[/b][/u] Duel Arena *Ancient Magik (I'll look.) Great Economy PKing EVERYWHERE Castle Wars Following
[u][b]Minigames[/b][/u] Void Dragon Rune Money God Wars
[u][b]Miniquests[/b][/u] Saving the Princess Troublesome Uh Oh!&King Green Dragon Boss &King Red Dragon Boss &Mith Warhead Dragon Boss
& - Need client.
[u][b]Quests(All of them are members quests!)[/b][/u] It's War! Part I It's War! Part II Desert Treasure Monkey Madness Recipe For Disaster Cook's Assistant The Alliance of Poseidon Part I The Alliance of Poseidon Part II Wanted! King's Sword Knight's Fortress
[u]Other[/u] NPC Dialogue
[u][b]Client-Wise[/b][/u] JFrame *With Music Awesome Sephiroth Chatback0 Cool GameFrame Awesome Background Custom Models New Sprites
* - Not sure.
[u]Server Completion[/u]:
[b]||||||||||[/b]
[u]Client Completion[/u]:
[b]||||||||||[/b]
[u]Current Work[/u]:
Currently adding Tutorial Island. I know how to do everything except the bar with the progress. I need some IDs for ALL the NPCs in it, look on RuneScape, if you want, or I could use completely DIFFERENT NPCs.
[u][b]Latest Updates[/b][/u]
Just added a few NPC dialogue, but not the amount of NPC Dialogue I wanted yet, though.
Pictures:
[img]http://img81.imageshack.us/img81/7782/npcdialoguetutorialyi6.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://img228.imageshack.us/img228/2571/npcdialoguepj6.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img132.imageshack.us/img132/3131/npcdialoguepartiiwm9.jpg[/img]
And my personal favorite:
[img]http://img230.imageshack.us/img230/7369/npcdialoguetutorial2bg9.jpg[/img]
Note: I won't release until a few months, [s]after my current projects are done.[/s] I just felt like creating a client background from a cool Guthan pic from RuneScape.

item.title: Project Poseidon 317 - Summon-Pkz Base
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

[quote=“Kubanito, post:35, topic:249310”]Lol…

[code]
…

HasLessLogs == true;
if(HasLessLogs)

I’m guessing that’s what you meant.

Beacause

if(ifHasLessLogs)

Doesn’t sound right.[/quote]
That is wrong actually.

hasLessLogs = true;

Would be correct.

@Full Metalst

Good luck with this, and wanting to do it by yourself; even better good job.[/code]

Read full topic
